TEXT.TITLE: TEXAS INSTRUMENTS INC <TXN> RAISES QUARTERLY
TEXT.BODY: Qtly div 18 cts vs 16.6 cts prior Pay July 20 Record June 30 NOTE: Prior payment adjusted for three-for-one stock split. In April, company had announced its intention to raise the dividend. Reuter
